thread.title: Night parrot, Australia's most mysterious bird, spotted in Broome
thread.title_full: Night parrot, Australia's most mysterious bird, spotted in Broome

title: Night parrot, Australia's most mysterious bird, spotted in Broome

organizations.name: wa department of parks and wildlife

text: A group of men from Broome has struck birdwatching gold. They've spotted Australia's most mysterious bird: the night parrot. FEATURED:Adrian Boyle, Broome birdwatcherNigel Jackett, warden, Broome Bird ObservatoryDr Allan Burbidge, principal research scientist, WA Department of Parks and Wildlife, Chair of the Night Parrot Recovery Team
